Package com.agenarisk.api.io

Class JSONAdapter

java.lang.Object
com.agenarisk.api.io.JSONAdapter
public class JSONAdapter extends Object
JSONAdapter enables encoding of an API1 model as JSON.
Author:
Eugene Dementiev
